subject: Resource Page on Website
preview: Thank you both, the changes functional changes (links, downloads etc.) will indeed need to be done at the OFC end. We are simply styling the data and functions that there system is pushing to the web

full_threads.body:
Thank you both, the changes functional changes (links, downloads etc.) will indeed need to be done at the OFC end. 

We are simply styling the data and functions that there system is pushing to the website.

I have a feeling that is controlled by me, but I'm looking to find out. It's definitely either me or OFC, not on Heath's side. And as for the buttons, no worries - I emailed OFC to see if they have any insight. More to come.

Erica Fleck

Marketing Manager



T 800 966 8557 • C 812 630 7138

acoufelt.com

I can't seem to individually select a button, it's all or nothing.

Erica is the verbiage on the left controlled by you? Did we decide to not have the thicknesses as filters? And what about the bottom thickness?

Awesome!! First glance, this looks wonderful! And that is interesting that it wasn't more stylized initially. I'll be sure to give them that feedback. I think more needs to be done on my end on linking up files, but for the most part, the downloads button should work. Is this something that I should reach out to OFCDesk about, I assume?

Thanks so much Heath!

Erica Fleck

Marketing Manager



T 800 966 8557 • C 812 630 7138

acoufelt.com

Hi Erica,

We have styled the page now. It's really odd how little initial styling they provide you with. We have made a best guess on what the buttons etc are there for. Please have and let me know what you think:
https://acoufelt.com/design-symbols

It looks like the downloads may not be fully ready/available as yet as the buttons produce an error. Is that your expectation at this stage?

Hi Erica, 

Ok, we will run the overrides from our end. Leave it with me, we will update for you when ready to review.

Good morning Heath!

So we talked to OFCDesk about the changes requested on the Resource page. Their answer was short and sweet without much extra information (see below). Do you need me to go back and ask for any specific info/input on how to make these changes? I will help in any way I can, I'm just obviously not well-versed in your area of expertise! So, just let me know what you need and I'll do my best to find answers if necessary.

Thanks so much!

Erica Fleck

Marketing Manager



T 800 966 8557 • C 812 630 7138

acoufelt.com
I will do that. Thank you.

Hi Kristi, 

We can likely run some overrides, however, ideally this should be done at the Ofc. This will be aid in the load time and also mean the design changes will automatically carry across to the new site. Can you please check with Ofc if they can accommodate the below for you?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Thank you for setting up the page. The formatting changes I'd like to see are like this. I'm not sure if this is all from the website development arena or if we need to go back to Ofc Desk. Make all like the first image below. Two lines of text before bar.
  • Put page numbers and Next on bottom of page.
  • Turn boxes white or no fill with 1 pt outline black.
  • Make font size smaller.
  • Make image bigger
  • Move select button near download icon
  • Make area less wide- fits directly below image.

Hi Kristi, 

Sure, confirming we have setup the Design Symbols integration here:
https://acoufelt.com/design-symbols/

It's not yet added to the main menu yet, as it looks like there needs to be styling updates as you mentioned.
We have however renamed INSPIRATIONS to RESOURCES and changed Project Snapshots to upper case. 

Let me know if you need any further help with this?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Heath Maguire
Glen Tenorio assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia
Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
Hello,

On the U.S. site only, we need a resource page on our website that talks to the platform a company named Ofc Desk is hosting for us. (Not sure hosting is the correct word, technically.) They've told us it's as easy as embedding a YouTube video and we hope that's the case.

Below is the information given to us to set up the page but we will need to go in and make font, font size changes to match the rest of site. I would love for this page to be live by the 21st. However, I am aware that Lucy Pittman and Keenan are sending you a few more pages to build on new products for the U.S. so please let me know if that date will be a problem. The most important thing is that I tell people the actual date it will be done by and we hit it.

Navigation:
Change our main navigation choice of INSPIRATION to RESOURCES.
Add DESIGN SYMBOLS in drop-down.
Leave the project snapshots, gallery and case studies under this tab as well (except please make Project Snapshots upper case to match the rest).

If you have questions for Ofc Desk, I'm happy to set up a meeting. They are in Chicago which is CST time but I've alerted them that a conversation may be in order and timing is tricky.


From Ofc Desk - As requested along with instructions on how to embed into your website.


appId: 6D6F56D725A4E39
author number: 66d6f56d-725a-4e39-9326-e34edf9f0568
how to embed: https://desk.zoho.com/portal/ofcdesk/en/kb/articles/connect-search-how-to-embed

Look forward to seeing the draft and you response on timing. And again, talking directly to Ofc Desk is definitely an option if you need it.

Kristi




Kristi Rubino
Director of Marketing




T 800 966 8557 • C 317 914 9646
